titleStmt.title: An acte for the repeale of certayne actes made in the tyme of Kyng Edwarde the Sixt
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Regiæ excusum,

notesStmt.note: Act repealing Edward VI's acts concerning election of bishops, marriage of clergy, and administration of the sacrament of Holy Communion.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
